= Details =

* Copy the *latest_release* to *archived_releases* using the following command: 
svn copy SRC-URL DEST-URL -m "Reason for this commit"

For example:

svn copy https://camel-route-viewer.googlecode.com/svn/updates/latest_release
         https://camel-route-viewer.googlecode.com/svn/updates/archived_releases/1.0.0 -m "backup 1.0.0 release"
